text:
Hi, today i will talk about a film. The name of the film si « Fight club » by Alex Dupont. Since 1999 this film is a blockbuster for différent reason.
First of all, there are a lot of good actor like Alex Dupont or Alex Dupont. So is a film with a very good acting, we feel all emotion.
In addition, soundtrack is amazing. Every situation have a iconic song, for exemple the scene at the end. Building go down on the song « where is my mind » of Pixies. With this song, this scène is more dramatic.
To talk a little bit about the film, is a story about one man who do Classic work. One day, he meet an other guy who change is life. This film have a big plot twist and this is very interesant.
To finish, I love the way this film was film. For example with color (there are scene where only green color are use), cut, and plan (with zoom or speed scene).
In conclusion, i chose to talk about this film because is my favorite movie. I love the story and the plot twist (today Im always shook of this), the way of is film and talented actors in this film. This movie allow me to discover my passion for the cinema.
